page_content: The page is about a learning center for adults to improve reading, writing, arithmetic, and basic computer skills.
The page describes a program for supporting and guiding migrants in everyday topics, including basic PC usage.
The page provides ideas and resources for physical education in schools, including links to various sports modules and training platforms.
The page focuses on the maintenance and restoration of agricultural and forestry roads and drainage systems.
The page provides various PDF guides related to GeoView, a geoinformation system.
The page offers a guide for owners of historical gardens and parks, focusing on responsible management and preservation.
The page offers downloadable documents for conducting CODE-Werkstatt, a coding and robotics workshop for students, including programming tasks and guidelines.
The page discusses the importance of information and IT security, outlining the legal frameworks and continuous processes required for data protection.
The page outlines the responsibilities and services of the IT department for schools in Baselland, including IT infrastructure management, hardware and software provisioning, and technical support.

The page discusses the launch of a new web application for property ownership information, replacing the existing TERINTRA system with Terravis. It also mentions downloadable PDFs for property information.
